name: Slack Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Slack Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Slack API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Slack API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
File (值: file)
Message (值: message)
Reaction (值: reaction)
Star (值: star)
User (值: user)
User Group (值: userGroup)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create)
Disable (值: disable)
Enable (值: enable)
Get Many (值: getAll)
Update (值: update)

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: The Slack channel to get the reactions from
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: The Slack channel to get the reactions from | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

channelVisibility.name: channelVisibility
channelVisibility.description: Whether to create a Public or a Private Slack channel. More info.
channelVisibility.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel Visibility | 作用: Whether to create a Public or a Private Slack channel. More info. | 默认值: public | (必填项)
available_options: Public Channel (值: public)
Private Channel (值: private)

userIds.name: userIds
userIds.description: The ID of the user to invite into channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
userIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Names or IDs | 作用: The ID of the user to invite into channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: include_count (值: None) - Whether to include the number of users in each User Group
include_disabled (值: None) - Whether to include disabled User Groups
include_users (值: None) - Whether to include the list of users for each User Group

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelId (值: None) - Channel containing the file to be listed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
showFilesHidden (值: None) - Whether to show truncated file info for files hidden due to being too old, and the team who owns the file being over the file limit
tsFrom (值: None) - Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive)
tsTo (值: None) - Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive)
types (值: None) - Filter files by type
userId (值: None) - Filter files created by a single user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: Whether to resolve the data automatically. By default the response only contain the ID to resource.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: Whether to resolve the data automatically. By default the response only contain the ID to resource. | 默认值: False

name.name: name
name.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups. | (必填项)

ts.name: ts
ts.description: Timestamp of the message to update
ts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Timestamp | 作用: Timestamp of the message to update | (必填项)

purpose.name: purpose
purpose.natural_language_description: 参数名: Purpose | 作用: A new, specialer purpose | (必填项)

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message to add, get or remove
timestamp.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Timestamp | 作用: Timestamp of the message to add, get or remove | (必填项)

select.name: select
select.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Message To | 默认值: user | (必填项)
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
User (值: user)

user.name: user
user.description: The ID of the user to get the online status of
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: The ID of the user to get the online status of | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''}

messageType.name: messageType
messageType.description: Whether to send a simple text message, or use Slack’s Blocks UI builder for more sophisticated messages that include form fields, sections and more
messageType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Type | 作用: Whether to send a simple text message, or use Slack’s Blocks UI builder for more sophisticated messages that include form fields, sections and more | 默认值: text
available_options: Simple Text Message (值: text) - Supports basic Markdown
Blocks (值: block) - Combine text, buttons, form elements, dividers and more in Slack 's visual builder
Attachments (值: attachment)

text.name: text
text.description: The message text to update. Supports markdown by default - this can be disabled in "Options".
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Text | 作用: The message text to update. Supports markdown by default - this can be disabled in "Options".

blocksUi.name: blocksUi
blocksUi.description: Enter the JSON output from Slack's visual Block Kit Builder here. You can then use expressions to add variable content to your blocks. To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder
blocksUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blocks | 作用: Enter the JSON output from Slack's visual Block Kit Builder here. You can then use expressions to add variable content to your blocks. To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder | 提示: To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder | (必填项)

noticeAttachments.displayName: This is a legacy Slack feature. Slack advises to instead use Blocks.
noticeAttachments.name: noticeAttachments
noticeAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: This is a legacy Slack feature. Slack advises to instead use Blocks.

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 默认值: {}
available_options: fallback (值: None) - Required plain-text summary of the attachment
text (值: None)
title (值: None)
title_link (值: None)
color (值: None) - Color of the line left of text
pretext (值: None) - Text which appears before the message block
author_name (值: None) - Name that should appear
author_link (值: None)
author_icon (值: None) - Icon which should appear for the user
image_url (值: None)
thumb_url (值: None)
footer (值: None) - Text of footer to add
footer_icon (值: None) - Icon which should appear next to footer
ts (值: None) - Timestamp of the message to post
fields (值: None) - Fields to add to message

otherOptions.name: otherOptions
otherOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Other options to set | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeLinkToWorkflow (值: None) - Whether to append a link to this workflow at the end of the message. This is helpful if you have many workflows sending Slack messages.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: channels (值: None) - A comma-separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
description (值: None) - A short description of the User Group
handle (值: None) - A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.
include_count (值: None) - Whether to include the number of users in each User Group
name (值: None) - A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

query.name: query
query.description: The text to search for within messages
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Query | 作用: The text to search for within messages | (必填项)

sort.name: sort
sort.description: How search results should be sorted. You can sort by.
sort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort By | 作用: How search results should be sorted. You can sort by. | 默认值: desc
available_options: Newest (值: desc)
Oldest (值: asc)
Relevance Score (值: relevance)

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields
available_options: Using Fields Below (值: fields)
Using JSON (值: json)

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

target.name: target
target.description: Choose whether to add a star to a message or a file
target.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item to Add Star | 作用: Choose whether to add a star to a message or a file | (必填项)
available_options: Message (值: message)
File (值: file)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be uploaded
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Property | 作用: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

Options.name: Options
Options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelIds (值: None) - A comma-separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
description (值: None) - A short description of the User Group
handle (值: None) - A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.
include_count (值: None) - Whether to include the number of users in each User Group

userGroupId.name: userGroupId
userGroupId.description: The encoded ID of the User Group to update
userGroupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Group ID | 作用: The encoded ID of the User Group to update | (必填项)

option.name: option
option.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: include_count (值: None) - Whether to include the number of users in each User Group
